From Coq             Require Import List.
From MetaCoq.Common  Require Import BasicAst Kernames Universes.
From MetaCoq.Utils   Require Import bytestring.
From MetaCoq.Erasure Require Import EAst.
From Agda2Lambox     Require Import CheckWF Eval.
Import ListNotations.

Definition env : global_declarations :=
  [((MPfile ["Input"%bs; "Export"%bs], "ad"%bs),
    ConstantDecl
      {| cst_body :=
           Some
             (tLambda
                nAnon
                (tCase
                   ({| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Export"%bs);
                       inductive_ind := 0 |},
                    0)
                   (tRel 0) [([nAnon; nAnon], tRel 1)])) |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs; "Export"%bs], "nt"%bs),
    ConstantDecl
      {| cst_body :=
           Some
             (tLambda
                nAnon
                (tCase
                   ({| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Export"%bs);
                       inductive_ind := 0 |},
                    0)
                   (tRel 0) [([nAnon; nAnon], tRel 0)])) |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs], "main"%bs),
    ConstantDecl
      {| cst_body :=
           Some
             (tConstruct
                {| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Export"%bs);
                   inductive_ind := 0 |}
                0
                [tConst (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "and"%bs);
                 tConst (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "not"%bs)]) |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Export"%bs),
    InductiveDecl
      {| ind_finite := Finite; ind_npars := 0;
         ind_bodies :=
           [{| ind_name := "Export"%bs; ind_propositional := false;
               ind_kelim := IntoAny;
               ind_ctors :=
                 [{| cstr_name := "constructor"%bs; cstr_nargs := 2 |}];
               ind_projs := [] |}] |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs], "not"%bs),
    ConstantDecl
      {| cst_body :=
           Some
             (tLambda
                nAnon
                (tCase
                   ({| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs);
                       inductive_ind := 0 |},
                    0)
                   (tRel 0)
                   [([],
                     tConstruct
                       {| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs);
                          inductive_ind := 0 |}
                       1 []);
                    ([],
                     tConstruct
                       {| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs);
                          inductive_ind := 0 |}
                       0 [])])) |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs], "and"%bs),
    ConstantDecl
      {| cst_body :=
           Some
             (tLambda
                nAnon
                (tLambda
                   nAnon
                   (tCase
                      ({| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs);
                          inductive_ind := 0 |},
                       0)
                      (tRel 1)
                      [([],
                        tConstruct
                          {| inductive_mind := (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs);
                             inductive_ind := 0 |}
                          0 []);
                       ([], tRel 0)]))) |});
   ((MPfile ["Input"%bs], "Bool"%bs),
    InductiveDecl
      {| ind_finite := Finite; ind_npars := 0;
         ind_bodies :=
           [{| ind_name := "Bool"%bs; ind_propositional := false;
               ind_kelim := IntoAny;
               ind_ctors :=
                 [{| cstr_name := "r#false"%bs; cstr_nargs := 0 |};
                  {| cstr_name := "r#true"%bs; cstr_nargs := 0 |}];
               ind_projs := [] |}] |});
   ((MPfile ["LamBox"%bs], "Empty"%bs),
    InductiveDecl
      {| ind_finite := Finite; ind_npars := 0;
         ind_bodies :=
           [{| ind_name := "Empty"%bs; ind_propositional := false;
               ind_kelim := IntoAny; ind_ctors := []; ind_projs := [] |}] |})].

Compute @check_wf_glob eflags env.

Definition prog1 : program :=
  (env, tConst (MPfile ["Input"%bs], "main"%bs)).

Compute eval_program prog1.
